detail_desc: Relaxed-fit, V-neck T-shirt in airy linen jersey with a seam down the back.
Pyjamas in soft jersey. Long-sleeved, printed top with raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Cap in woven fabric with an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
V-neck body in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Metal earrings in various sizes. Three pairs of studs and three of hoops.
Oversized polo-neck jumper in a soft chenille knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Short, gently flared skirt in woven fabric with a concealed zip at the back and a high waist with a decorative metal buckle at the front.
A pair of metal earrings in the shape of a hand decorated with rhinestones and plastic beads.
Top in soft cotton jersey with short butterfly sleeves. Front in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a washed look. Elasticated drawstring waist, a text print on one leg, a back pocket and roll-edge hems.
Oversized top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Felted wool beret. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a button placket. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Top in soft, pleated jersey with a slight sheen. V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, an elasticated seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist, and long balloon sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs.
Ribbed top in lightly brushed, stretch fabric with a V-neck, long sleeves and a drawstring at the hem.
Flared skirt in an airy, lightly crinkled weave made from a cotton blend with a concealed zip at the back and billowing vertical flounces. Lined.
Treggings in stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.

Set with a short-sleeved football top and football shorts in fast-drying functional fabric. Top with a print motif front and back. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and print motifs on the legs.
Dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short, elasticated sleeves. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Short, sleeveless dress in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck with a tie detail and small opening at the front. Concealed zip in one side, and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a chest pocket.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in a soft, organic cotton textured knit. Rib-knit straps that fasten at the back, front pockets and ribbing at the top and hems.
Long-sleeved top in hard-washed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with reversible sequins on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins), long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and a rounded, ribbed hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Padded outdoor trousers in breathable windproof, water-repellent, functional fabric with adjustable hook and loop tabs and elastication at the waist. Zipped front pockets, closed seams, a zip fly and press studs, and reinforced hems with snow flaps. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Hoodie in soft faux shearling with a kangaroo pocket and appliqués on the front. Long sleeves and trims at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted jumper in a ribbed viscose blend with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Blouse in softly draping satin with a pleated stand-up collar and a small opening and buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with pleated, buttoned cuffs.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with a V-neck at the back and buttons down the back. Gathered seam and decorative bow at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
3/4-length leggings in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Sports jacket fast-drying functional fabric with a small stand-up collar, hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Reflective details. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.
T-shirt in airy wool slub jersey with a slight sheen. Ribbed neckline.
Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a motif.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Shirt in airy end-on-end cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Shirt in softly draping twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide trousers in a soft viscose weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, sewn-in tie belt, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
H&M SUPPORTS WWF. Top in printed, lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Oversized biker jacket with a large collar, diagonal zip down the front and zipped front pockets. Detachable belt with a metal buckle at the hem. Lined.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and raw-edge hems.

Wide, straight-cut, knee-length shirt dress in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back with a pleat for added width. Low dropped shoulders and long, voluminous balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Open chest pocket and a rounded hem with high slits in the sides. Unlined.

T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Jumpsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with narrow, braided shoulder straps and elastication at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and 3/4-length, wide legs.
Hipster briefs in organic cotton jersey with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
High-waisted shorts in a linen and cotton weave with wide elastication and a frill trim at the waist and pockets in the side seams.
Long-sleeved jumper in a cable knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
14 pairs of metal earrings in various sizes and designs.
High-waisted, ankle-length running tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide panel at the waist containing a concealed key pocket.
Short, straight-cut T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline. Unlined.
Trousers in a linen and cotton weave with an elasticated, ribbed drawstring waistband, fake fly, diagonal front pockets and fake back pockets.
Short nightslip in jersey made from a cotton blend with a lace-trimmed V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and rounded hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated weave with a concealed button and zip in one side. Jersey underskirt.
Knee-length kaftan dress in softly draping jersey with a slight sheen. Deep V-neck front and back, a gathered seam below the bust and horizontal ties at the back of the neck. Unlined.
Ankle-length chinos in stretch cotton with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hems with creases.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in patterned jersey with elastication, gathers and a flounce at the top. 3/4-length raglan sleeves, visible seams at the front and a flounced trims at the sleeves and hem.
Hipster briefs in soft cotton jersey with lace trims. Mid waist, a lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with reflective details. Lined hood with a collar, long raglan sleeves, cuffs with thumbholes, a zipped chest pocket, and a zip in the sides with slits in ventilating mesh. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft jersey with a collar and button placket.
Trainers in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Fine-knit moccasins with soft terry inside, imitation leather trims and soft suede soles.

Sports tights in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waist panel. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

prod_name: FUNC. SB Samuel water rep TP
detail_desc: Puffer jacket in quilted, water-repellent functional fabric with reflective details. Stand-up collar, detachable, fleece-lined hood and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets with a press-stud, and covered elastication at the cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back. Partly lined in fleece. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif and slits in the sides of the hem.
Top in a patterned viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Joggers in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Short dress in a sturdy weave with short puff sleeves and a concealed zip at the back. Fitted bodice and bell-shaped skirt.

Fitted, double-breasted tuxedo jacket in woven fabric with a satin shawl collar. Flap front pockets, a detachable, adjustable belt with a round, decorated buckle at the waist, and a single back vent. Lined.
Flared, calf-length skirt in a double layer of tulle with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Cropped off-the-shoulder top in glittery jersey with smocking at the top and hem, and long wide sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
